item.title: YUMC
item.description: score:279 Chances: Yum China Holdings, Inc. has been ranked number one globally for the Restaurant & Leisure Facilities Industry in the S&P Global 2023 Corporate Sustainability Assessment, reflecting the company’s commitment to sustainability. Yum China’s KFC recently unveiled its 10,000th store in Hangzhou, solidifying its leadership in China’s dynamic restaurant market.
